Quote

A quote produce an isolated, indented, piece of text to emphasize a statement somewhere within an article.
Usage:
{iop quote}Quote text{/iop}

Slider

Produces a slider as on w3schools

Attention: Separate urls by a semicolon and make sure that there are no spaces in between the {iop slider}herearenospacesallowed{iop}

Attention: When you paste links into the Joomla! article editor, make sure to unlink them! Otherwise Joomla! inserts them as html hyperlink which causes a rendering failure.

Attention: Currently only 1 slider per article is allowed.

If you stick to the rules, the slider is a nice thing. You can also add text caption, simply precede the image url by the caption text and close it with a vertical line character "|". Usage:
{iop slideshow}This is slide 1|https://www.w3schools.com/howto/img_nature_wide.jpg;This is slide 2|https://www.w3schools.com/howto/img_snow_wide.jpg;https://www.w3schools.com/howto/img_mountains_wide.jpg{/iop}
